member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR
member.summary: Represents a rate control structure definition for constant quality target with constrained bitrate.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.InitialQP
member.summary: When is enabled, allows the Initial QP to be used by the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.MinQP
member.summary: When is enabled, limits QP range of the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.MaxQP
member.summary: When is enabled, limits QP range of the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.MaxFrameBitSize
member.summary: Maximum size in bits for each frame to be coded. When is enabled, limits each frame maximum size in the rate control algorithm.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.TargetAvgBitRate
member.summary: Indicates the target average bit rate, in bits/second.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.PeakBitRate
member.summary: Indicates the maximum bit rate that can be reached in bits/second while using this rate control mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_QVBR.ConstantQualityTarget
member.summary: The quality level target. The values are codec-specific as each standard defines the range for this argument.
